page.name: custom
page.pad5: slip on & effect_active 'brakeStart' & repeat_start_instant 'rsibrakeStart' 10ms & effect_active 'brakeStart' 1 ? nothing : repeat_stop 'rsibrakeStart' & play & slip off
page.pad6: set 'rsGainBS' '`gain' & gain -20% & slip on & effect_active 'backspin' & repeat_start_instant 'rsiBackSpin' 10ms & effect_active 'backspin' 1 ? nothing : repeat_stop 'rsiBackSpin' & play & slip off & get_var 'rsGainBS' & param_cast & gain
